files.description: CLI utility that appends/updates outputs/index.md (and optional outputs/manifest.json) with the command run, declared inputs, produced files, and sha256 checksums for results.json/figure.png/logs after each run.
Human-readable run ledger that records each pipeline execution (timestamp, command, inputs, outputs, and sha256 checksums) and is updated by the update_outputs_index script.
Machine-readable manifest of runs including command, inputs, produced files, and sha256 checksums for key artifacts, maintained by the update_outputs_index script.

missionDescription: Create /outputs/index.md (or manifest.json) that records: command run, inputs, produced files, sha256 checksums for results.json/figure.png/logs; update it after each run.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
